com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.range
Class RangeFilterState

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.stateful.util.RegexTransitionState
      com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.range.RangeFilterState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State, MatchProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegexReportingState
public class RangeFilterState
extends RegexTransitionState

This state has exactly one other succeeding state. That state will be the next state if the token this state refers to is found.

Additionally, you can define

  • whether the characters that appear before the found token shall be deleted from the stream,
  • whether the token itself shall be deleted from the stream.

    Since:
    14.09.2011
    Author:
    rwoo

    modifyBuffer

    protected int modifyBuffer(StringBuilder characterBuffer,
                           int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer,
                           MatchResult matchResult)
    Description copied from class: RegexTransitionState
    Modifies the character buffer if the token was found. Returns the position of the first character that is modifiable.

    The default implementation does not modify the buffer. Returns the end of the match as new first modifiable character in the buffer.

    Overrides:
    modifyBuffer in class RegexTransitionState
    See Also:
